actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill for the relief of William L. Stuck, Glenn Jenkins, Charles L. Cavell, Alto C. Bowdoin, Jr., and Nathan J. Schnurman.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to five named individuals in full satisfaction of their claims against the United States based on exposure to toxic chemicals or agents during chemical warfare testing.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of William L. Stuck, Glenn Jenkins, Charles L. Cavell, Alto C. Bowdoin, Jr., and Nathan J. Schnurman.
